original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=1 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 23:17:28' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 01:27:29' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 1 AND comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 23:17:28'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 01:27:29'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E4.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E4E2.UserId)
